thread.section_title: Lube Mobile Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Lube Mobile | lubemobile.com.au
thread.title: Jacinta Gallagher
thread.title_full: Lube Mobile reviewed by Jacinta Gallagher

author: Jacinta Gallagher
title: Jacinta Gallagher
text:
I had an incident early in the week where I needed to call on the services of Lube Mobile to repair my much loved VW EOS.
Darren - Assistant Manager for QLD (whom I am most appreciative of) was able to work his incredible magic and had Michael Van:Q18 on site within 2 hours. Michael proved not only to be professional, honest, knowledgeable, reliable and efficient but also an incredibly nice guy. Thank you so much Darren and Michael for making a stressful experience, uncomplicated and for allowing it to result in a great outcome. This was my first encounter with Lube Mobile and I would definitely recommend you guys in the future!
